code: import React from'react';import{FiSmile,FiMeh,FiFrown}from'react-icons/fi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SentimentIndicator=_ref=>{let{sentiment,size=20}=_ref;const getSentimentIcon=()=>{switch(sentiment){case'positive':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiSmile,{className:"text-green-500",size:size});case'neutral':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiMeh,{className:"text-yellow-500",size:size});case'negative':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiFrown,{className:"text-red-500",size:size});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiMeh,{className:"text-gray-400",size:size});}};const getTooltipText=()=>{switch(sentiment){case'positive':return'Positive feedback';case'neutral':return'Neutral feedback';case'negative':return'Constructive feedback';default:return'No sentiment data';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"relative group inline-flex",children:[getSentimentIcon(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"absolute bottom-full left-1/2 transform -translate-x-1/2 mb-2 px-2 py-1 text-xs font-medium text-white bg-gray-800 rounded opacity-0 group-hover:opacity-100 transition-opacity duration-200 whitespace-nowrap",children:getTooltipText()})]});};export default SentimentIndicator;
